prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant blue and red colors that resembles a friendly insect.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a firefly, glowing in the dark with bright colors.
Generate a small, bug-like creature with a round body and oversized antennae, perfect for a whimsical setting.
Make a Pokemon that has a mix of blue and yellow stripes, showcasing a cheerful and energetic character.
Imagine a creature that flits around the forest at night, illuminating its surroundings with soft light.
Design a Pokemon with a distinct insectoid shape and a playful personality that loves to dance in the air.
Show me a charming Pokemon with a vibrant color palette and a joyful demeanor, ideal for forest habitats.
